heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section 

835D(3)) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited tax consolidation act 1997 (section 835d(3)) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section
heading: 2. The Transfer Pricing Guidance on Financial Transactions: Inclusive
text_raw:
2. The Transfer Pricing Guidance on Financial Transactions: Inclusive 
Framework on BEPS Actions 4, 8-10, OECD, Paris, approved by the OECD’s 
Committee on Fiscal Affairs on 20 January 2020, are designated as being 
comprised in the transfer pricing guidelines for the purposes of Part 35A of the 
Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [686] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
